    Library Finance_0_0_0

    Namespace: http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/finance/v0

    • BusinessObjects 
      Name Description
      FormOfPayment
      Specifies the form of payment.
    • CoreObjects 
      Name Description
      BankAcct
      Customer bank account definition.
      EncryptionToken
      OpenTravel Best Practice: Use of Encrypted, Masked or Tokenized Information: Certain OpenTravel schema may have combinations payment and/or account information with other personally identifying information, such as customer name and date of birth. For enhanced customer privacy and security, it is RECOMMENDED that the payment and account information be protected, using tokenization or some other encryption method and displayed in a masked format.
      DirectBill
      Company name and location for sending invoice for remittances for travel services.
      PaymentCard
      Specifies the details of the debit or credit card.
      SignatureOnFile
      Signature on file.
      ThreeDomainSecurity_Gateway

      ThreeDomainSecurity_Results  
      TicketingAccountInformation

      Name Description
      BankAccountType  
      CustomerLoyalty
      Program rewarding frequent use by accumulating credits for services provided by vendors.
      LoyalLevel
      Indicates special privileges in program assigned to individual.
      LoyaltyCertificate
      Identifies the Loyalty Program, membership, form factor used by the certificate and its current status.
      OriginalIssueAttributes
      Provides information about the original document on which the reissue is based.
      PaymentCardType_Issuer
      Code of the payment card issuer.
      TaxRegistrationDetails  
      Voucher
      A form of payment using a voucher or coupon.
      ConjunctionTicketNbr
      Conjunction ticket number in case a conjunction ticket is exchanged.
      Rerouting
      Indicates if the rerouting, which made the exchange necessary was voluntary or involuntary.
